Dessert

The s is repeated twice in dessert because you always want more of it.

Ice Cream Bar (Cole Valley)

Located at 815 Cole St San Francisco

They have delicious floats and handmade ice cream! The coconut almond vegan ice cream is literally better than most non-vegan ice creams.

View Yelp Page

Smitten Ice Cream

Located at 432 Octavia St San Francisco

Some of the best ice cream in SF! Using nitrogen to freeze it, the ice cream is really creamy. They do cool flavor combos such as red pepper ice cream with honey

View Yelp Page

Three Twins Ice Cream

Located at 254 Fillmore St San Francisco

Solid if you're in the area, but not my fave

Plentea

Located at 341 Kearny St San Francisco

They serve boba in glass bottles that you get to keep! The nutella one is my fave.
